definition: Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods

sentences.english: When Moses was at Mount Sinai God chose to reveal his face.
sentences.chinese: 摩西在西乃山上时，上帝定意显明祂的面。

sentences.english: He asked specifically that God might reveal both the dream and its meaning.
sentences.chinese: 他明确祈求神显明梦的内容和梦的含意。

sentences.english: A. One form in which God revealed His moral Law to people is the Ten Commandments.
sentences.chinese: 神显明给他百姓的道德律法的一个形式就是十条诫。

sentences.english: It is manifested to us when we believe in the Lord Jesus.
sentences.chinese: 我们相信主耶稣，神的义就向我们显明出来。

sentences.english: They would also say the Bible shows this in the Old and New Testaments.
sentences.chinese: 他们也认为圣经的旧新约也显明了这一点。

sentences.english: How does our Abba Father show His love to us ?
sentences.chinese: 天父如何向我们显明他的圣爱？

sentences.english: With long life will I satisfy him, and shew him my salvation.
sentences.chinese: 我要使他足享长寿，将我的救恩显明给他。

sentences.english: Christ came not only to die for us but to reveal the Father.
sentences.chinese: 基督降世不单是为我们受死，更是要将父神显明出来。

sentences.english: Ask God to show you that person's strengths.
sentences.chinese: 求神向你显明那个人的能力。

sentences.english: In the furnace God shows that he saves believers from fire.
sentences.chinese: 在火窰中，神显明祂解救信徒脱离烈火。

sentences.english: Col. 4:4 That I may make it manifest as I ought to speak.
sentences.chinese: 西四4叫我按著所当说的，将这奥秘显明出来。

sentences.english: He’ll take of mine, and manifest it to you.
sentences.chinese: 祂会将受于我的告诉你们，并且会显明给你们看。

sentences.english: He showeth Himself at all times and in all places.
sentences.chinese: 他无时无刻，无处不在地显明自身。

sentences.english: But he that doeth truth cometh to the light, that his deeds may be made manifest, that they are wrought in God.
sentences.chinese: 但行真理的必来就光，要显明他所行的是靠神而行。

sentences.english: If thou do these things, shew thyself to the world.
sentences.chinese: 你如果行这事，就当将自己显明给世人看。

sentences.english: This signalized to become a surname is also use culture and legal system to maintain a social public order.
sentences.chinese: 这就显明了成氏也是用教化和法制来维持社会的治安。

definition: (third person pronoun for a divine being)
Jehovah (biblical name for God, Hebrew: YHWH)/compare Yahweh 雅威[Ya3 wei1] and God 上帝[Shang4 di4]
